entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
